name: Square-Enix
description: Built, maintained, and published all websites for all of Square-Enix's brands using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS
Published over 50 websites, coordinating development within the team in both California and London
Refactored at least 5 large repos from JavaScript to TypeScript and from Next Pages router to Next App router
Led the team towards modular components that would allow faster and easier deployment of new sites
Was key member of my team to coordinate with the Marketing teams within the Square-Enix America office

name: Activision Publishing
description: Lead developer for my.callofduty.com, developing immersive, data-driven features for 4 generations of Call of Duty using Vue.js
Refactored the My Call of Duty code to be dynamic, scalable, and easy for other developers to dive into
Produced the Marketing websites for Call of Duty, Destiny, Crash Bandicoot and more within Adobe Experience Manager
Helped spearhead the transition from AEM's Classic UI to Touch UI
Worked with the mobile team to contribute to the Call of Duty Companion App using React Native

name: MarketShare
description: Prototyped and implemented new ideas in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks for MarketShare's web marketing analytics software
Collaborated with a global development team between California and India, conducting 2 daily meetings to improve productivity.

name: Beachhead Studios, Activision Publishing
description: Integral part of the 2012 Call of Duty: Elite launch, which included a complete redesign and brand-new features for Call of Duty: Black Ops II, including Leagues, Zombies and updated Player card
Developed and optimized native web views for the Call of Duty: Ghosts app for login/registration and news
Built microsites for key events such as Early Clan Registration and Diamond Division Clan Wars

name: BeachMint
description: Maintained a network of 5 e-commerce websites under a single JavaScript framework, handling modules including showroom and product pages.

name: likeZEBRA.com
description: Led development and maintenance of likeZEBRA's site as sole developer, handling over 20 features.
Increased user engagement by implementing 4 key features, including Twitter integration, automated wall messages, and the creation of a monetization system.
Redesigned website architecture to integrate backBEAT feature, supporting a new strategic direction.

name: MyShape.com
description: Improved weekly promo asset readiness by 100%, preparing and updating assets using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and Photoshop.
Led redesign of MyShape.com website, enhancing look, layout, and codebase
Created and optimized 1 HTML email campaigns weekly for compatibility across all major email clients.
Maintained front-end assets, ensuring consistent performance and visual appeal.

name: Sony Online Entertainment
description: Redesigned Sony Online Entertainment's Intraweb, improving internal user experience for all employees by implementing modern HTML, CSS, and Javascript techniques.
Built 3 web updates using HTML, CSS, and Javascript to Sony Online Entertainment's game sites.
